title: MBMBaM 598: Chocolate that Helps You Fudge
description:
Have we got a bodacious show for you, full of verisimilitude and similar ephemera. Don’t mind our loquaciousness, we’re trying to be more quixotic.

Suggested talking points: I’m Rutherford B. Hayes, In the Boston-verse, Your Bruno Nest, Electronic Tricks, Razzle Beret

National Black Women’s Justice Institute: https://www.nbwji.org/ Huntington Children's Museum: https://hcmkids.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
